```{r _shedule, echo=FALSE}
library(yaml)
conf <- yaml.load_file("_meta/schedule.yml")
course <- conf[["current"]]
course_name <- conf[[course]][["title"]] 
start_data <- conf[[course]][["start"]] 
end_data <- conf[[course]][["end"]] 
exam     <- conf[[course]][["exam"]] 
slots <- conf[[course]][["slots"]] 
```

### `r course_name` ( `r start_data` -- `r end_data` )

<br/>

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
for (i in 1:length(slots) ) {
  slot <- slots[[i]]
  doc <- paste0(names(slots[i]),".html") # <slot name>.html
  cat('#### (',i,') [', slot[["title"]] ,':',slot[["subtitle"]],'](',doc,')\n\n')
  cat('#####          ', slot[["date"]],' | ',slot[["time"]],' | ',slot[["venue"]])
  if (slot[["tasks"]] == "yes") {
    cat(' | [ [exercises](',sub(".html", ".tasks.nocode.html", doc) ,') ]' ,' ',
        '[ [solutions](',sub(".html", ".tasks.html", doc),') ]' ,
        '\n\n---')
  } 
  cat('\n\n\n\n')
}

cat('### Exam: ', exam[["date"]],' | ',exam[["time"]],' | ',exam[["venue"]])
```
